SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.api.services

Klasse CalendarService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.lat.api.services.CalendarService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ICalendarService
public class CalendarService extends Object implements ICalendarService
Service class for managing calendar entries.

This class implements the ICalendarService interface and provides methods to retrieve, add, and delete calendar entries. It interacts with the ICalendarEntryRepository to perform CRUD operations on calendar entry data.

The service can be initialized with a default repository obtained from the DataController or with a custom repository instance.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

  • Methodendetails

    • getCalendarEntries

      public List<CalendarEntry> getCalendarEntries()
      Retrieves a list of all calendar entries.

      This method calls the repository's method to get all calendar entries and returns them as a list.

      Angegeben von:
      getCalendarEntries in Schnittstelle ICalendarService
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of CalendarEntry objects representing all calendar entries.

    • getCalendarEntry

      public Optional<CalendarEntry> getCalendarEntry(int id)
      Retrieves a specific calendar entry by its ID.

      This method calls the repository's method to get a calendar entry by its ID and wraps it in an Optional.

      Angegeben von:
      getCalendarEntry in Schnittstelle ICalendarService
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the calendar entry to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      an Optional containing the CalendarEntry if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • addCalendarEntry

      public boolean addCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Adds a new calendar entry.

      This method calls the repository's method to create a new calendar entry and returns a boolean indicating success or failure.

      Angegeben von:
      addCalendarEntry in Schnittstelle ICalendarService
      Parameter:
      calendarEntry - the CalendarEntry to be added.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the calendar entry was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • deleteCalendarEntry

      public boolean deleteCalendarEntry(CalendarEntry calendarEntry)
      Deletes a specific calendar entry.

      This method calls the repository's method to delete a calendar entry and returns a boolean indicating success or failure.

      Angegeben von:
      deleteCalendarEntry in Schnittstelle ICalendarService
      Parameter:
      calendarEntry - the CalendarEntry to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the calendar entry was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
